channel.title: Joke Thread
channel.description:
I thought i'd create a joke thread to vent some jokes.
Some are racist (in a joke way) some are rude, and some are about p-e-d-o-f-i-l-e-s.
Okay here are a few, Contributions welcome.
[b]What do you call a gay diabetic? A Sugar Puff.[/b]
Christianity: One woman's lie about having an affair got seriously out of hand.
[b]The History channel+1 Where history repeats itself.[/b]
America will happily invade a country to get oil, Now where kindly delivering it to their shores and they dont like it.
[b]Give those fucking africans £2 a month and they go and spend it on a bloody horn.[/b]
When i was in junior school i was suspended for fingering a girl behind a bike shed. Now my son is in junior school and history is repeating itself. I got arrested this time though.
[b]When Meeting your girlfriends parents for the first time You cant help but think "Ive licked your daughters nipples"[/b]
Whats the difference between a paedophile and a terrorist? A Pedo actually gets his virgins.
[b]Why dont black people go on cruises? They aint falling for that again.[/b]
Ironman is a superhero Iron women is a command
[b]American Scientists have finally made a car that runs on water!! Unfortunatly it only works with water from the gulf of mexico.[/b]
Well, Thats the last time i get in a Cumbrian taxi and shout, "I CALL SHOTGUN"
[b]After a night out on the piss in whitehaven I threw up in a taxi this morning. I was worried about the cost of valeting the car but the driver Generously said "Somebody is going to pay for this" Before driving off. What a nice man.[/b]
It's amazing how long people hold a grudge for, I had my school reunion last night Most of them still havent forgotten me for that gun massacre.
[b]Roses are read, Niggers are brown When they go swimming, I hope they drown I aint racist, just abit of a knob. But at least i aint polish, after your job.[/b]

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:20, topic:345311”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=441688.msg3265659#msg3265659 date=1278850156]
This topic is bad and you should feel bad end yourself.
[/quote]

Why post here if you don’t like it? it was previously stated that it was approved by an admin, Therefore you must be after jokes or you wouldn’t be here :P[/quote]By posting he made a joke of himself. Thus he should be allowed to post.

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Its funny how things change,

Years ago if you had a moat round your village you felt safe!

[b]Work this anagram out.

Niggres

(heres a clue: Murderous race of people with lack of respect for the law)

Thats right, Gingers.[/b]

I was outside the hospital the other day having a cig when this bloke in a wheel chair said to me,
"why do you smoke?

I looked at him and said
“Why the fuck do you wear shoes?”

[b]Im a barbie girl

In a barbie world

tits are plastic

Sons a spastic

He cant comb his hair

He dribbles everywhere

Its fantastic

little black spastic

Come on harvey

Lets go party![/b]

Read full topic

item.description:

Why do they call it the XBox 360?

Because it had no games.

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Whats faster then a black man running down the street with your tv?

His brother running down the street with your dvd player

[b] Kamakazi bombers?

Theres a Jap for that[/b]

I have an imaginary dog which is cool because i can see it and no one else can… Bit like the opposite of a guide dog

[b]A friend said to me the other day "Did you know that if you combine bicarbonate of soda with vinegar it explodes?

“Fascinating” i said, “Did you know if you combine Muslims with lies about virgins, They explode?”[/b]

I think Al Qaeda made a huge mistake knocking down BOTH twin towers…

Just think how embarrassing it would have been just having one twin tower.

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Have you ever noticed its only the “perfect” people that get murdered or are involved in horrific accidents?

“He was the perfect son” Or “she was the perfect daughter”

“Such a tragic accident, they were a perfect family”

“they died together… the perfect couple till the end”

Makes me glad i abuse my kids and beat up my wife.
Kinda makes me immortal.

My wife was screaming profanity at me during labour… so i said “Well i wanted to put it in a different hole… But you said it would be too painful”

I wont be having sex with the wife for 6 days, Period.

[b]The Sun: “Defoe goal sets up clash with you know who.”

I didnt know Volemort qualified?"[/b]

Read full topic

Brad do you have any issues with " burn in " on your plasma?
nope
kool
How well does it handle blacks
I have it bolted to the wall, so they can’t really take it without some serious work

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

^ LOL.

A man escapes from prison where he has been for 15 years. He breaks into a house to look for money and guns and finds a young couple in bed.
He orders the guy out of bed and ties him to a chair, while tying the girl to the bed he gets on top of her, kisses her neck, then gets up and goes into the bathroom.
While he’s in there, the husband tells his wife: “Listen, this guy’s an escaped convict, look at his clothes! He probably spent lots of time in jail and hasn’t seen a woman in years. I saw how he kissed your neck.” If he wants sex, don’t resist, don’t complain, do whatever he tells you. Satisfy him no matter how much he nauseates you. This guy is probably very dangerous. If he gets angry, he’ll kill us. Be strong, honey. I love you."
To which his wife responds: “He wasn’t kissing my neck. He was whispering in my ear. He told me he was gay, thought you were cute, and asked me if we had any vaseline. I told him it was in the bathroom. Be strong honey. I love you too!!”

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

The new government are increasing VAT to 20%. Yeah we’ll have to pay more, but some Maths questions are going to be a hell of a lot easier!

PS: I was told in high school that VAT was 17.5% so taxi drivers etc have to work out 10%, add half of that and then halve it again. What’s the point in that? Should have made it 20 to begin with.

Read full topic

I was worried about the cost of valeting the car but the driver Generously said “Somebody is going to pay for this” Before driving off.

@Thebeanie wrote:

I thought i’d create a joke thread to vent some jokes.

Some are racist (in a joke way) some are rude, and some are about p-e-d-o-f-i-l-e-s.

Okay here are a few, Contributions welcome.

What do you call a gay diabetic?
A Sugar Puff.

The History channel+1

America will happily invade a country to get oil,
